boomHappyQuotes.quote: Man, I'll tell ya what, dang ol' life’s good, man, just gotta sit back, kick it, man, you know what I’m sayin’?
I tell ya what, man, sometimes you gotta, dang ol' kick back with a cold one, talkin' 'bout relaxin', man.
Man, ain't nothin' better than sittin' around, watchin' TV, doin' nothin', tell ya what, man.
Ain't nothin' better, man, than hangin' with the boys, dang ol' barbecue, man, livin' the dream.
Life, man, I'll tell ya, it just like dang ol' rollercoaster, man, goin' up, goin' down, man, you just gotta ride it.
Ain't nothin' like dang ol' sunshine, man, just makes ya feel good, like dang ol' brand new, man.
Man, look at that sky, clear as can be, man, ain't nothin' like it, I'll tell ya what.
I tell ya what, man, dang ol' barbecue weather, man, can’t beat that, tell ya what.
You don't listen, man. I ain't talkin' 'bout that dang ol' life, man, it's all just a moment, man.
Ain't nothin' like a cold one, man, out in the sun, tell ya what, man, just livin' the dream.
Dang ol' destiny, man, talkin' bout the planets align, just like a big ol' dipper, man.

boomSadQuotes.quote: Man, I'll tell ya what, sometimes it just ain't worth it, man, dang ol' life gets tough, man.
Dang ol' heart, man, it just gets broken, man, ain't no fixin' that, I'll tell ya what.
I tell ya what, man, life can be dang ol' hard sometimes, man, like, dark clouds everywhere, man.
Ain't nothin' sadder, man, than when it's rainin', man, on a good day, tell ya what, messes everything up.
Man, look at that weather, ain't no sunshine, man, makes ya feel low, like, dang ol' nothin', man.
I tell ya what, man, this dang ol' rain, man, messes up the whole dang ol' day, man.
Ain't no good, man, them clouds just hangin' there, man, like a weight, I'll tell ya what, man, it gets ya down.
You know, man, I was just thinkin', man, life just like a dang ol' road, man, you gotta drive on through it.
Man, when it storms, it's like, dang ol' storm inside, too, man, I’ll tell ya what, just ain't right.
I tell ya what, man, rain just keeps comin', man, kinda like life’s troubles, man, can't stop it.
I tell you what man, that y2k man, that old mainframe gonna come crashin down on that old grid, man.
